revised_title: Approximations to the Eigenvalue Relation for the Orr-Sommerfeld Problem
tldr: The authors present approximations to the eigenvalue relation for the Orr-Sommerfeld problem, a mathematical model used to study the stability of fluid flows in a boundary layer. They compare their results with previous methods and provide error estimates for the approximations. This work contributes to the understanding of fluid dynamics and the behavior of flows in channels.
